columns.name: default_ebs_encryption_enabled
columns.description: Indicates whether encryption by default is enabled.

columns.name: default_ebs_encryption_key
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or alias of the default CMK for encryption by default.

columns.name: snapshot_block_public_access_state
columns.description: Gets the current state of block public access for snapshots setting for the account and Region.
